title: question about legacy /  limited skins
body:
hello everyone

so i was asking if heartseekrs skins or snow day skins or winter wonder or bewitching skins would be available any other time this year 

and are they available in chests ?

thanks everyone

replies.body:
Legacy skins go on sale again for the relative period of the year. So Heartseaker series is on sale again near valentine, and Winter skins are on sale during December. 

They can always be found in chests if you are lucky enough.

The only skins that never go on sale are retired ones.
